query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_usage_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  itemId INT NOT NULL,
  quantityChange INT NOT NULL,
  changeType ENUM('fulfillment', 'bulk_assignment', 'adjustment', 'received_shipment', 'inventory_count', 'damage', 'return', 'other') NOT NULL,
  quantityAfter INT NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  changedBy INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_itemId (itemId),
  INDEX idx_timestamp (timestamp)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aYsLc9eZnrL9DEu.43c395b54aa0 --database 2Awpr243D2Jitpj6Cn66Rx --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_usage_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  itemId INT NOT NULL,
  quantityChange INT NOT NULL,
  changeType ENUM('fulfillment', 'bulk_assignment', 'adjustment', 'received_shipment', 'inventory_count', 'damage', 'return', 'other') NOT NULL,
  quantityAfter INT NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  changedBy INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_itemId (itemId),
  INDEX idx_timestamp (timestamp)
)
